eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Gila; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; AT 02:01 PM ON NOV 03, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 10:02 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Bullhead City, Arizona. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Bullhead City Police Department is looking for 76-year-old Raoul Hernandez. He is described as a Hispanic male, 5 feet 11 inches tall, 175 pounds with black hair and brown eyes. Raoul was last seen on Monday, November 3, 2025, at 6:30 A.M., near 2200 Block of Diamond Creek Road, Bullhead City, Mohave County, Arizona, 86442. Raoul is believed to be wearing a green shirt, black pants and brown shoes. Raoul suffers from a medical condition(s) and may become disoriented or easily confused. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
